commands.a: Here are the commands for this game:

commands.b: Draw: Picks up a card from the draw pile and transfers it to your hand.

commands.c: Play (of card): Puts specified card on top of the discard pile if the move is legal.

commands.d: Uno (of card): Plays the card if the card is legal and if you would have one card left in your hand after playing it.

commands.e: Uno2: When the other player only has one card and has not called uno yet, you can call uno on them to make them draw four cards.

commands.f: Rules: Lists the rules of Uno out.

commands.g: Commands: Lists the commands of this game.
